paper.title: The Secure Conferencing User Agent: A Tool to Provide Secure Conferencing with MBone Multimedia Conferencing Applications
paper.abstract: This report briefly describes the Secure Conferencing User Agent (SCUA), which provides secure conferencing with privacy and authentication. The SCUA was implemented using the MICE multimedia conferencing applications with built-in encryption and the security infrastructure developed in the Password Project. Both MICE and PASSWORD were projects of the European Union. The paper describes the first prototype of the SCUA which was developed by GMD in the MICE project and the planned enhancements of it.
